sentence.Network_en: Making people feel foolish is emphatically not my strategy.
sentence.Network_cn: 让人出丑显然不是我的策略。

sentence.Network_en: Politics is most emphatically back on the agenda.
sentence.Network_cn: 政治问题显然重新提上了日程。

list.abs: emphasis 强调emphatic understanding 拟情的了解empirical 经验的

英语语法专用称呼_百度文库 ... Ellipsis/ellipsis dots 删节号 Emphatic sentence 强调句 Exclamation 感叹.

entry.tran: 强调地;加强语气地;断然地
entry.def: If you say something emphatically, you say it in a forceful way which shows that you feel very strongly about what you are saying.

example.ex: Mr Davies has emphatically denied the charges.
example.tran: 戴维斯先生断然否认了那些控诉。

entry.def: You use emphatically to emphasize the statement you are making.

example.ex: Making people feel foolish is emphatically not my strategy...
example.tran: 让人出丑显然不是我的策略。

example.ex: Politics is most emphatically back on the agenda.
example.tran: 政治问题显然重新提上了日程。

auth_sentence.content: Democracy is emphatically not what al-Qaeda is fighting for.
auth_sentence.res_content: Democracy is emphatically not what al-Qaeda is fighting for.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Democracy is emphatically not what al-Qaeda is fighting for.

auth_sentence.content: These ideas are most emphatically not our party policy.
auth_sentence.res_content: These ideas are most emphatically not our party policy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These ideas are most emphatically not our party policy.

auth_sentence.content: He was politically emphatically slapped down by Mr Hogan-Howe.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was politically emphatically slapped down by Mr Hogan-Howe.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was politically emphatically slapped down by Mr Hogan-Howe.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 语势强的, 用力的, 显著的, 断然的
stems_affixes.word_buile: em进入+pha=phas外貌,状态,显示+tic表形容词→进入状态的→用力的, 显著的
emphatic用力的+ally表副词→adv.强调地, 用力地
em进入+phas外貌,状态,显示+is→进入状态→强调
phas外貌,状态,显示+e→定相→相位→ 阶段；方面
em进入+phas外貌,状态,显示+ize……化→进入状态→强调，着重
phas外貌,状态,显示+e→定相→相位→ 阶段；方面

sentences.en: “This,” he added emphatically,“had been the principle by which I composed music.”
sentences.cn: 他接着强调说,“这就是我作曲所依据的原则。”
